title: Pesticide residues alter taxonomic and functional biodiversity in soils
summary:
Nature, Published online: 28 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09991-z

A wide survey of pesticide effects on soil biodiversity across 373 sites in Europe reveals that pesticide residues occur in 70% of sites and have major ef…
body: Nature, Published online: 28 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09991-z A wide survey of pesticide effects on soil biodiversity across 373 sites in Europe reveals that pesticide residues occur in 70% of sites and have major effects on soil biodiversity and functional ecology.

title: "جنون الذهب".. كيف تتأثر مصر وهل ينصح بالبيع أم الشراء؟
summary: شهدت أسواق الذهب في مصر ارتفاعات جنونية متتالية، قادت سعر الجرام إلى مستويات قياسية وغير مسبوقة، وسط تدافع من جانب حائزي العملة المحلية "الجنيه" على الشراء، طمعا في تحقيق استثمار جيد في أحد أكثر الأصول أمانا على المدى الطويل.

title: The 5 Golden Rules To Follow When Buying Olive Oil, According To Maria Loi
summary: Because the brand you buy matters.

title: Varna Gold: Humanity's first gold jewelry was found in a cemetery with a gold 'penis sheath'
summary: Archaeologists found hundreds of burials in the Copper Age cemetery in Varna, Bulgaria, some of which were littered with gold artifacts.
